title: U.S. automobile registrations 1999 to 2017
summary: The statistic shows the Number of passenger cars in the 1999 from to 2017 .
A declining tendency could be observed as the Number of passenger cars dropped from 127083019 in 2005 to 6,146 in 2017 .
gold: This statistic represents the number of registered automobiles in the United States from 1999 through 2017.
In 2017 , there were about 111 million automobiles registered in the United States.
In 2017 , a total of around 272 million motor vehicles were registered in the U.S .
